Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees have been involved in several close games this postseason but have yet to be in a close series, which is expected to change in the Fall Classic against the Dodgers.
Carlos Rodón's performance will be crucial for the Yankees, as they need him to aim for a quality start in his first game of the Fall Classic.
Giancarlo Stanton has been vocal about the importance of winning the championship and has impressive stats this postseason.
Luke Weaver has been a key player for the Yankees, stepping up as a closer and exceeding expectations.
Gleyber Torres has improved his performance since being moved to the leadoff spot, providing a key element to the Yankees' offense.
Jazz Chisholm's acquisition has added power, speed, and energy to the Yankees' lineup, although his performance has cooled off recently.
